name: Epic game (Denislafff)
description:
My first game! I hope you get fun with it!

Assets used: Skull Trumpet (Audio), Roblox Logo and Lonely wizard (from inscryption)

Made from Clickteam Fusion 2.5 (free version)

Creator: Unkown#3929

Contributor: ivan550#9521 (He gave me the assets c: )

Quick note: Game can have bug that possible you collect 29, less or higher so if happen that you collect 29 or less then restart game till you get 30 or higher!
